title: Japan Match T-shirt from 2014 World Cup
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5014.jpg)

I was shot off the t-shirt so the letters look angled bu they are nit angled, all straight up and down.  
Thanks
author: tokyopav

comments.content: Can't find a perfect match. That's something close to [DIN Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042400/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/din+condensed)/ [DIN Engschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042400/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engschrift), the main differences for these letters being on /R leg, /2 design and some angled cut finials. For what it's worth, I'd probably start with [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725042400/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garage-gothic), possibly the less work to get close of this lettering.
